description:
Miyu faces Kuro alone in battle in order to protect Illya. Though Miyu puts up a fierce fight without giving an inch, her blade won`t reach Kuro. "So let`s all die together as good friends and end this. Wouldn`t that be nice?" As Miyu tries to defeat Kuro`s dual swords, Illya comes running to stop them both, and then...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On the Other Side of Lies and Facade
嘘と強がりの向こう側
